document_data.mainbody:
he Ammathvale was a small open valley separating the Lluirwood in the north from the Southern Lluirwood in Luiren.
This region stretched west to east between the Traders Way and the city of Ammathluir spanning roughly . An unnamed road branched off from the Traders Way to pass through the Ammathvale, connecting the rest of the cities of Luiren.
* Ammathluir
